doctor.name: Dr. Md. Asaduzzaman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Asaduzzaman is a Liver Specialist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Hepatology). He is a Assistant Professor, Hepatology at Mugda Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Asaduzzaman at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 6pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Debraj Malakar
doctor.info: Dr. Debraj Malakar is a Liver Specialist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hepatology). He is a Consultant, Hepatology at General Hospital (Victoria), Narayanganj. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Modern Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Debraj Malakar at Modern Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
